title: Erik De Luca
text: Hello! Iâ€™m Erik De Luca, an actuary with a passion for data science, always seeking new ways to transform complex numbers and data into comprehensible stories and practical solutions. With a background in statistics and actuarial techniques, I have a keen interest in quantitative finance and portfolio optimization. When not immersed in numbers, I indulge in travel, craft beer brewing, and judo. Welcome to my corner of the web!
